class Solution:
    def maxValue(self, a: List[int]) -> List[int]:
        n=len(a)
        if n==0: return []
        if n==1: return [a[0]]
        p=[0]*n
        p[0]=a[0]
        for i in range(1,n):
            t=p[i-1]
            p[i]=t if t>=a[i] else a[i]
        s=[0]*n
        s[-1]=a[-1]
        for i in range(n-2,-1,-1):
            t=s[i+1]
            s[i]=t if t<=a[i] else a[i]
        r=[0]*n
        st=0
        for i in range(n-1):
            if p[i]<=s[i+1]:
                m=p[i]
                for j in range(st,i+1):
                    r[j]=m
                st=i+1
        m=p[-1]
        for j in range(st,n):
            r[j]=m
        return r

fmin = lambda x,y: x if x<y else y
fmax = lambda x,y: x if x>y else y

class Solution:
    def maxValue(self, A: List[int]) -> List[int]:
        N = len(A)
        S = A[:]
        m = A[-1]
        for i in range(N-2,-1,-1):
            m = fmin(m, A[i])
            S[i] = m

        anchor = 0
        ans = [0] * N
        cur = NINF = float('-inf')
        for i in range(N - 1):
            x = A[i]
            cur = fmax(cur, x)
            if cur <= S[i+1]:
                for j in range(anchor, i + 1):
                    ans[j] = cur
                anchor = i + 1
                cur = NINF

        cur = fmax(cur, A[-1])
        for j in range(anchor, N):
            ans[j] = cur
        return ans
